Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
PLCCom.WriteRequest.addUniCodeChar(char)
          please use: addString or addS7String 
PLCCom.WriteRequest.addUniCodeChar(char[])
          please use: addString or addS7String 
PLCCom.ReadResult.get_UniCodeChar()
          please use getString or getS7String 
PLCCom.ReadResult.get_UniCodeChar(int)
          please use getString or getS7String 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.getLocal_MPI()
          Please use getBUS_ADRESS_LOCAL() 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.getLocal_PPI()
          Please use getBUS_ADRESS_LOCAL() 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.getPLC_MPI()
          Please use getBUS_ADRESS_PLC() 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.getPLC_PPI()
          Please use getBUS_ADRESS_PLC() 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.GetPLCTime()
          please use GetPLCClockTime 
PLCCom.ConnectResult.HasConnected()
          please use Quality() 
PLCCom.OperationResult.HasWorked()
          Please use Quality 
PLCCom.BasicInfoResult.Ordernummer()
          member Ordernummer has been replaced by member OrderNumber 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.setLocal_MPI(int)
          Please use setBUS_ADRESS_LOCAL(int value) 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.setLocal_PPI(int)
          Please use setBUS_ADRESS_LOCAL(int value) 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.setPLC_MPI(int)
          Please use setBUS_ADRESS_PLC() 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.setPLC_PPI(int)
          Please use getBUS_ADRESS_PLC() 
PLCCom.PLCcomDevice.SetPLCTime(Calendar)
          please use SetPLCClockTime
